long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Rediscover the joy of shared viewing experiences with Tizzme, the free Chrome extension that shows you what YouTube users are watching in real time. Say goodbye to algorithmic recommendations and hello to personalized discoveries.

*Features:

*Real-Time Viewing: Watch YouTube videos simultaneously with friends and other users in real time, creating shared viewing experiences that transcend geographical boundaries.

*Personalized Watch Guides: Take control of your YouTube viewing experience by creating personalized watch schedules. Plan your content for the day, from sports podcasts in the evening to live news and stand-up comedy videos later at night.

*Re-Sync Stream Button: Using the ad-supported free version of YouTube? Never let unpredictable ads ruin a shared moment again. Utilize the re-sync button to catch up to your Premium friends and ensure seamless viewing experiences.

*Public Live Room Feed: Dive into Tizzme's dynamic world of public live rooms. Browse through a list of all public rooms created by users, filter them by genre, join the live room chat, and discover new content in your favorite genres in real time.

*Private Password-Protected Rooms: Create password-protected rooms to enjoy private real-time watch sessions with your closest family and friends on Tizzme. Enjoy confidential conversations and a more intimate viewing experience away from the public eye.
